revised_title: The Development and Growth of the Human Facial Bones
tldr: The author examines the formation and growth of the human facial bones, focusing on the maxillae and intermaxillary bones. They describe the process of ossification and the development of the bones in the human fetus, including the role of cartilage and membrane in bone growth. The study provides insights into the anatomy and embryology of the human face.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Human Anatomy
